effect: Becomes a +1 weapon after a long rest in a forest. Reverts to normal upon leaving.
Becomes a +1 weapon after a long rest outdoors. Reverts to normal upon leaving.
Becomes a +1 weapon after a long rest underground. Reverts to normal upon leaving.
Becomes a +1 weapon after a long rest in a jungle. Reverts to normal upon leaving.
Becomes a +1 weapon after a long rest near a volcano. Reverts to normal upon leaving.
Becomes a +1 weapon after a long rest in a dungeon. Reverts to normal upon leaving.
Becomes a +1 weapon after a long rest anywhere there is snow on the ground. Reverts to normal upon leaving.
Becomes a +1 weapon after a long rest anywhere within a mile of an ocean. Reverts to normal upon leaving.
Becomes a +1 weapon after a long rest in a desert. Reverts to normal upon leaving.
Becomes a +1 weapon after a long rest in a city. Reverts to normal upon leaving.
The bearer gains advantage on attack rolls when attacking any creature that does Acid damage.
The bearer gains advantage on attack rolls when attacking any creature that does Fire damage.
The bearer gains advantage on attack rolls when attacking any creature that does Cold damage.
The bearer gains advantage on attack rolls when attacking any creature that does Poison damage.
The bearer gains advantage on attack rolls when attacking any creature that does Necrotic damage.
The bearer gains advantage on attack rolls when attacking any creature that does Radiant damage.
The bearer gains advantage on attack rolls when attacking any creature that does Lightning damage.
The bearer gains advantage on attack rolls when attacking any creature that does Psychic damage.
The bearer gains advantage on attack rolls when attacking any creature that does Thunder damage.
The bearer gains advantage on attack rolls when attacking any creature that does Force damage.
The bearer can cast Burning Hands (Level 3) once per day.
The bearer can cast Chill Touch (Level 3) once per day.
The bearer can cast Acid Splash (Level 3) once per day.
The bearer can cast Witch Bolt (Level 3) once per day.
The bearer can cast Eldritch Blast (Level 3) once per day.
Contains 1d4 charges of Burning Hands (Level 3). Cannot be recharged.
Contains 1d4 charges of Chill Touch (Level 3). Cannot be recharged.
Contains 1d4 charges of Acid Splash (Level 3). Cannot be recharged.
Contains 1d4 charges of Witch Bolt (Level 3). Cannot be recharged.
Contains 1d4 charges of Eldritch Blast (Level 3). Cannot be recharged.

The bearer gains +1 to Wisdom saving throws.

Behaves as a +1 weapon when attacking undead.
Behaves as a +1 weapon when attacking goblinoids.
Behaves as a +1 weapon when attacking giants.
Behaves as a +1 weapon when attacking fiends.
